actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to authorize the head of any Federal department or agency to set aside the total amount of any procurement by such department or agency for a labor surplus area.

summary.text: Authorizes the head of any Federal agency to procure property or services for such agency from areas of high unemployment if such agency head determines that bids or offers will be obtained from a sufficient number of eligible concerns to assure that awards will be made at reasonable prices.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the head of any Federal department or agency to set aside the total amount of any procurement by such department or agency for a labor surplus area.
